p: Finally, it also must be noted that antiretroviral treatments, either in the form of ART for PLWH or the form of pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP), may bestow some protection against COVID-19 [ 30, 64]. In fact, at the IDP, many of the PLWH are not presenting with severe symptoms of COVID-19. If there is evidence to support this assertion, there must be ongoing vigilance to identify and treat HIV infections and actively maintain PLWH in treatment and care.
